answerText: Persian Gulf[10] This small island nation in the Persian Gulf with capital Manama claims the Hawar Islands, although the islands are closer to Qatar. This nation is ruled by the House of Khalifa.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 8 | 11 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The Hawar Islands are one group of disputed islands in this body of water.  [10] Name this body of water that is connected by the Strait of Hormuz to the Gulf of Oman and is located to the southwest of Iran.
